tosdr.case: The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.

title: The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.
quoteText: By displaying, publishing, or otherwise posting any UGC on or through the Platform, you hereby grant to Kongregate a limited, non-exclusive, sub-licensable, worldwide, fully-paid, royalty free license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such UGC.
